application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details required by condition 3 (Submission of details: (a) elevation (1:10) and section (1:5 / 1:1) drawings of new skirting boards with details of materials and methods as well as ceiling plans showing the locations of new cornicing; (b) details of existing and new service runs (plumbing / drainage / hot and cold water/ heating pipework/extraction etc.) including details of any alterations to fabric including alterations to joists, walling, external outlets, etc; (c) details of glazing for external door panels, including a section (1:5/1:1) to demonstrate thickness of glazing.) of listed building consent 24/01808 (Internal works to include internal refurbishment and redecoration works. Replacement of entrance door.)
